channel.title: Wolverine on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Wolverine on Homepage

item.title: Adamantium
item.description: <p>This joke was pretty much entirely written by my wife. I don’t really follow pop music, so I wasn’t familiar with the Dave Guetta/Sia song, but the scenario worked for me. <a href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=JRfuAukYTKg">Check out the video</a> if you want to hear what Wolvie is rocking out to, and watch what’s basically a mini X-men video.</p>
item.content:encoded: <p>This joke was pretty much entirely written by my wife. I don’t really follow pop music, so I wasn’t familiar with the Dave Guetta/Sia song, but the scenario worked for me. <a href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=JRfuAukYTKg">Check out the video</a> if you want to hear what Wolvie is rocking out to, and watch what’s basically a mini X-men video.</p>
